userbtcaddr-desc: Allows the wiki's users to [[Special:UserBitcoinAddresses|submit Bitcoin addresses]] for usage with other Bitcoin related extensions.
userbtcaddr-loginrequired: Please login to manage your Bitcoin addresses.
userbtcaddr-submitaddresses-manualinsert: Multiple addresses may be separated by a newline or any other non-alphanumeric character.
Please remove or correct the following {{PLURAL:$1|address|$1 addresses}}:
{{PLURAL:$1|Added address <tt>$2</tt> to your list.|Added $1 new addresses to your list.}}
The address <tt>$1</tt> was not added since it is already registered as yours.
The following $1 addresses were not added since they are already registered as yours:
No addresses were added since all $1 given addresses are already registered as yours:
